 2017-17402017-12-19,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Amending Order in Council P.C. 2015-1064
PrecisOrder Amending Order in Council P.C. 2015-1064 of July 3, 2015 by replacing paragraph (a) by directing that the POLAR MEDAL shall follow the European Security and Defence Policy Service Medal and the Common Security and Defence Policy Service Medal in the order of precedence in the Canadian Honours System.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2018-0006 Publication Date: 2018-01-10
